UniformAmmoOvercoat.name: Specialist's Overcoat
UniformAmmoOvercoat.description: Warden specialists require a uniform designed to optimize their capacity to haul a variety of heavy ammunition.

UniformArmourBreastplate.name: Gunner's Breastplate
UniformArmourBreastplate.description: Repourposed from ancient wars, these armour plates are highly effective at stopping enemy small arms fire. That protection comes at the cost of weight, and the wearer will feel quite restricted and encumbered.

UniformEngineerGear.name: Sapper Gear
UniformEngineerGear.description: Caoivish engineers are legendary in song and nature. They wear specialized uniforms, outfitted with belts and bags for easy access to tools and handheld materials.

UniformMedicJacket.name: Physician's Jacket
UniformMedicJacket.description: Physicians in the Warden army are umatched and this uniform has a plethora of pockets and bags designed to carry and deploy first aid gear easily.

general: $First Aid Kits and Trauma Kits have reduced encumbrance

UniformOfficerRegalia.name: Officer's Regalia
UniformOfficerRegalia.description: A formal uniform that denotes a regiment's leading officer. While impractical, the officer on duty may use their authority to discipline subordinates without reperation. Officers hold an important role in the Warden Military, dating back to ancient times when Caoiva was ruled by a dozen kings.

UniformScoutMantle.name: Outrider's Mantle
UniformScoutMantle.description: The Warden army relies on outriders to provide and recieve vital intelligence. Their gear is sturdy and well-suited for extended operations in rugget terrain and inclement weather.

general: $High chance of not being detected by enemy intelligence

UniformSnowParka.name: Caoivish Parka
UniformSnowParka.description: Born and bred in the northern cold, this heavy parka protects Warden infantry from all but the worst blizzards.

UniformTankSuit.name: Padded Boiler Suit
UniformTankSuit.description: Caoivish armour is unmatched in its design and resilience. All crew are provided with a sturdy boilersuit and satchel belts to access essential tools required for tank maintenance and operation.

UniformArmourVest.name: Velian Flak Vest
UniformArmourVest.description: A heavily reinforced vest designed to protect grenadiers from back blasts. As such, the Flak Vest reduces cuts and scrapes on top of dampening bullet impacts.

UniformEngineerRucksack.name: Fabri Rucksack
UniformEngineerRucksack.description: Engineers are the bones of the Mesean Republic. They are outfitted with a heavy bag and belts for easy access to tools and handheld materials.

UniformGrenadeBaldric.name: Grenadier's Baldric
UniformGrenadeBaldric.description: Of the most distinguished divisions of the Legion are the Grenadiers. They are outfitted with specialized satchels and pockets for maximizing their capacity to haul explosives.

UniformMedicFatigues.name: Medic Fatigues
UniformMedicFatigues.description: For medics of the Legion, this uniform has a plethora of pockets and bags designed to carry and deploy first aid gear easily.

general: $First Aid Kits and Trauma Kits have reduced encumbrance

UniformOfficerAttire.name: Officialis' Attire
UniformOfficerAttire.description: This uniform, while impractical in combat, denotes the head of a regiment. Appropriately dressed officers may freely discipline their subordinates. Ancient Mesean officialis were key to the Legion's organization. This modern attire honours their lasting legacy.

UniformRainOilcoat.name: Legionary's Oilcoat
UniformRainOilcoat.description: Quite accustomed to the temperate climates of the south, Colonials wear this oilcloth jacket paired with thick boots to operate at high efficiency in all but the heaviest storms.

UniformScoutCamo.name: Recon Camo
UniformScoutCamo.description: Legion scouts are deployed on the most dangerous missiosn. Their gear is lightweight, sturdy, and well-suited for extended operations in rugged terrain.

general: $High chance of not being detected by enemy intelligence

UniformSnowTopcoat.name: Heavy Topcoat
UniformSnowTopcoat.description: Unaccustomed to the cold, Legionaries must always adapt. This heavy topcoat is designed to mitigate the effects of cold while still allowing for optimal mobility and combat effectiveness.

UniformTankCoveralls.name: Tankman's Coveralls
UniformTankCoveralls.description: Nothing compares to the efficency and destructive capabilities of the Colonial armour division. Tank crew are provided with sturdy coveralls and satchel belts for easy access to essential tools required for tank maintenance and operation.
